name: Azim Shah
story: Qadeer Hakimi is a seasoned veteran, having served in various conflicts throughout the Middle East. He is known for his tactical prowess and his ability to lead his unit to victory. Despite his gruff exterior, he cares deeply for his men and will stop at nothing to ensure their safety. Qadeer is a devout follower of Islam and often finds solace in his faith during times of conflict.
